posts.description: Snows and blues moving north for the upcoming summer, in the constant search for food. Working together and making it work. I love the sounds of wings and honks in the air, early spring sounds. #birdmigration

Elk migrating toward the Thorofare valley in Wyoming, the deep backcountry of Yellowstone. My latest film Elk River is now viewable in full length (28min) for free-izzle! Part of a 3+yr elk project with scientist @arthurmiddleton and @natgeo. The film is edited and co-directed with me by @jennygnichols, featuring artist @jamesprosek and some nice cineflex aerials by @skiparmstrong. And big thx to longtime friend and filmmaker @shanemoorefilms for shooting the Thorofare backcountry segment of the film for us, with an extra solid dog howl sequence btw! Watch Jack the dog howl his heart out for the wild if you have some time this evening, link to full film in my profile.

Rarest bear in the world . The Gobi grizzly is the only desert dwelling most awesome bear you‚Äôve never heard of.

New book written by Doug Chadwick just dropped, a legend in the world of natural history storytelling, he has over written over 70 articles in @natgeo magazine over the past 40 years. I feel so so fortunate to have joined him on a few Gobi dez expeditions over the years. Link in profile to "Tracking Gobi Grizzlies", published by @patagonia. Take a look if you like bear stories :)
Washed up cottonwood tree on a Missouri River sandbar. Same scene as the video that I just posted. Zoom in to see the river, it's crisp clean h2o! #home #SoDak #cleandirt
Quiet morning on the home front, fresh blanket of snow, a brand new day. Two yellow leaves and five black birds. #homefornow #southdakota #prairie

One of my favorite memories from my ongoing decade long project #YellowstoneMigrations. This campfire vibes pic is featured in the upcoming  #NatGeoInspires @natgeobook // insta retrospective.
Speaking of retrospectives, lately I've been attempting the "don't look at my phone" game, hence the no grams üôÅ. Not sure if I'm winning, still playing, or what. But I just updated my website with the hopes that somebody had a hot minute to check it out! Link in profile üòú
